description:
Maximize your brushing potential. Two different brush ends provide options for cleaning holds from large slopers to tight slots.

  • Center cut-outs reduces amount of plastics used without sacrificing rigidity
  • Front brush has soft boars hair and crescent arc to remove maximum chalk
  • Back brush has stiff boars hair and a pronounced angle to get into slots without scraping your knuckles
name: Flashed Bolt Boar's Hair Brush
